Package controller

Class AppointmentController

java.lang.Object
controller.AppointmentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AppointmentController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Class to control appointment form window for scheduling system.

  • Method Details

    • onActionSave

      public void onActionSave(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException, SQLException
      Saves or Updates currently populated appointment to database. Populated data is validated for logical errors and prompts are presented to take corrective action. Used Lambda to carve out filtered appointment list from selected customer.
      Parameters:
      event -
      Throws:
      IOException
      SQLException

    • onActionCancel

      public void onActionCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Changes current form to Main Form. Confirmation will display voiding any entered information.
      Parameters:
      event - take action on event of pressing Cancel button
      Throws:
      IOException - handle exceptions

    • sendAppointment

      public void sendAppointment(Appointment appointment) throws Exception
      Used to transfer appointment information to current form for pre-populating fields.
      Parameters:
      appointment - appointment object received from other form.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • storeAppointment

      public Appointment storeAppointment()
      Used for creating appointment object from data populated on form.

    • sendCustomer

      public void sendCustomer(Customer customer)
      Used to transfer customer information to current form to pre-populate customer field.
      Parameters:
      customer - appointment object received from other form.
